text: is a Japanese professional tennis player. Kaji has a career-high singles ranking of 283, achieved on 29 January 2018. She also has a career-high WTA doubles ranking of 156, set on 23 September 2019. Kaji won her biggest ITF title to date at the 2019 Challenger Banque Nationale de Granby. ==ITF Circuit finals== ===Singles: 8 (4 titles, 4 runner–ups)=== {| |- valign=top | {|class=wikitable !
